CustomField.description: ADO 269310 Lift and Shift PSA Prod to GTM
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populate with last day of Quarter in which the Prepaid or $0 NSP Order will expire, per Deferred Report. For Installs, refer to AR 'Install Open & Close' Report > Actual Ship Date (column M) and add 90 days to Actual Ship Date. Example: If Actual Ship Date is 01/01/2023 +90 Days = 04/01/2023.
CustomField.label: Expiration Date
